thread.title: Hadi slams door on Bersatu for keeping ties with DAP, Amanah
thread.title_full: Hadi slams door on Bersatu for keeping ties with DAP, Amanah

title: Hadi slams door on Bersatu for keeping ties with DAP, Amanah
text:
More 
PAS president Abdul Hadi Awang said his party will not work with Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (Bersatu) in the coming general as long as the latter maintains ties with DAP and Amanah. 
â€œNo need to wait a month for Bersatu. We already have our policies. Our policy is we do not work with parties that have relations with DAP and Amanah.
